scripts.watch: npx lerna watch -- lerna run build --scope=\$LERNA_PACKAGE_NAME
scripts.storybook: concurrently "npm run watch" "npx lerna run storybook"
scripts.igvbrowser: concurrently "npm run watch" "npx lerna run igvbrowser"
scripts.genomicsdb: concurrently "npm run watch" "npx lerna run genomicsdb"
scripts.genomicsdb-debug: concurrently "npm run watch" "npx lerna run genomicsdb-debug"
scripts.ui-playground: concurrently "npm run watch" "npx lerna run ui-playground"
scripts.build-fresh: npm run clean-dist && npm run build
